text: Hera Björk Þórhallsdóttir (born 29 March 1972) is an Icelandic singer. She is known for representing Iceland at the Eurovision Song Contest 2010 with the song "Je Ne Sais Quoi", which placed 19th out of 25 finalists. In 2013, she won the Viña del Mar International Song Festival representing Iceland with the song "Because You Can". In 2024, she won Söngvakeppnin for a second time and represented Iceland at Eurovision 2024 with the song "Scared of Heights". == Sources == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Musicians from Reykjavík Category:Icelandic singers
title: Hera Björk
